resources:
Hungry Elephants
Welcome to the Hungry Elephants game! START GAME CONTINUE GAME Game rules High scores Previous score: Current score: Privacy policy https://github.com/SPK-z/PrivacyPolicies/blob/main/HungryElephants-PrivacyPolicy
The Higher Lower gamestring> Every round the game shows two numbers and an image. The elephant is really hungry! Therefore you should pick the highest number in this case. The mouse eats very little. Therefore you should pick the lowest number in this case. After a correct answer the score is increased. But beware! With higher scores, the given numbers may get higher as well. After an incorrect answer the game is over. Play as many times as you like!
High Scores Who achieved the highest scores? You may find their names and scores below. Nr. Name Score Date Are you sure? All data will be deleted. Delete Cancel Data deleted Well done! We will put your name in the list with high scores. Provide a name with at least 1 and at most 10 characters. Only letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores, spaces and periods are allowed. Enter name Add name No, thanks Invalid input Player X
